channel.title: Projects on Christian Tan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Christian Tan

item.title: The Ultimate Covid-19 Data Visualization
item.description: Background: The main goal for this project was to create a Dashboard Visualization for important data from the Covid-19 pandemic using Excel, SQL, and Tableau. The size of the spreadsheet was around 90,000 lines of data. Skills that were used included: Joins, CTE’s, Temp Tables, Windows Functions, Aggregate Functions, Creating Views, Converting Data Types, and Creating Visualizations/Dashboards in Tableau. The data is from https://ourworldindata.org/covid-deaths. Part 1: First, I downloaded the data into excel spreadsheets to do some initial cleaning.

item.title: Cyclistic - How a Bike-Share Company Can Navigate Speedy Success
item.description: Table of Contents Mission Statement and Preliminary Information Data Preparation and Exploration Data Processing Data Analyzing Share and Conclusion Mission Statement: The bike sharing company wants to analyze their users’ data to find the main differences between two certain types of users, the “casual” who pays for each ride and the “annual” member who pays a yearly subscription for the service.

item.title: The NBA 3-Point Revolution - The Way For NBA Teams to Win More Games
item.description: Table of Contents Project Description Data Preparation and Exploration 2.1 Data information 2.2 Brief Exploration 2.3 Data Transformations Modeling 3.1 Bar Chart 3.2 Plot Chart 3.3 Density Plot Chart 3.4 Significant/Insignificant Coefficients 3.5 Predictive Performance 3.6 Accuracy, Recall, Precision Results and Discussion Conclusion 1. Project Description Conventionally, in the sport of basketball there are defined player positions with standard body profiles.

item.title: Bellabeat - 3 Ways a Wellness Tech Company Can Play It Smart
item.description: Table of Contents Mission Statement and Preliminary Information Data Preparation and Exploration Data Processing Data Analyzing Share and Conclusion The Mission Statement: Bellabeat, a high-tech manufacturer of health-focused products for women, wants to analyze their smart device fitness data. This could help unlock new growth opportunities for the company. The goal is to focus on one of Bellabeat’s products and analyze smart device data to gain insight into how consumers are using their smart devices.
